title: MS and FPS are great but sometimes I lag
body: Sometimes when im playing i get these spikes of lag, my fps and ms reads stay good but i still lag. It last for like 2-10 sec where it starts with a freeze, followed by my character still moving on my last input before the lag. If my hp goes to 0 my hp bar disappears and i still run with the last input. Any suggestions on a fix?

replies.body: When your character seems to freeze and then start moving on their own with delayed commands, there's a pretty good chance that your network is having some problems with packet loss. Let's do a quick test for that using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Let me know how much packet loss it says with a screenshot and we'll go from there!

https://ibb.co/bRNvhv 
Quite high packet loss in some games but no in others.

Ooooo yea that 20-25% packet loss is probably what's causing that freezing. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a little more in-depth troubleshooting to get that fixed up, and make sure to send them the network logs that you used in that log reader!
